segments.text: I certainly did . Do you want to come in and give me some feedback about your weekend ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: how did the business trip go ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: well , to be honest , nothing is more stressful than going on a business trip with our boss .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I understand . The last time I went on a business trip with the boss , I didn't even have enough to eat !
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I also think the company is pretty cheap with travel expenses . I spent half of the weekend on a train ! Surely they could have afforded to buy a few plane tickets !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: our company is quite conscious of the environmental problems that frequent flying causes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I see . Well , then perhaps they could give me a few days off after a business trip . It was really tiring for me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I can ask the boss about giving you the day off today .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: thank you . I can't imagine getting much done today . I'm just too exhausted !
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: no problem . Did you bring any gifts back for your department ?
segments.speaker: S2
